input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "National Tree"
Reference Product Name: "Pre-Lit Downswept Douglas Fir Tree"
Reference Product Description:
This Downswept Douglas tree features Feel Real branch tip technology, creating a tree with remarkable realism. These crush-resistant branch tips are molded from real tree branches for an authentic living tree appearance. This tree is pre-strung with 650 clear lights that remain lit even if a bulb burns out. This tree features hinged branch construction for ease of assembly. Sturdy metal tree stand is included.

This Downswept Douglas Fir Full Pre-Lit Artificial Green Christmas Tree is 6.5 feet tall with a 49 inch base diameter. Featuring hundreds of Feel Real individually crafted branch tips to create full bodied branches, this tree is designed to look and fee
Features 650 clear lights that remain lit even when a bulb goes out. The lights are strung on the tree before packaging, offering an easier, more convenient set up.
This tree features pre-attached, hinged branches that drop down for a simple set-up and fold back in for quick and convenient storage. Properly shape the tree by peeling back the branches and pulling the tips apart.
Constructed with sturdy, high quality materials, hypo-allergenic, fire-resistant needles, this tree is built to bring holiday cheer for years to come. Includes a durable metal base.
At National Tree Company, we believe that special holiday memories donâ€™t have to be far and few between. This Christmas season, let our decorations transform your home while you focus on creating more of those magical moments.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='National Tree Downswept Douglas Fir Tree with Clear Lights 12''
  - Name='Puleo International Pre-Lit 5' Alpine Artificial Christmas Tree with 150 Lights'
  - Name='Balsam Hill 3.5' BH Balsam Fir Tabletop Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Denali White Christmas Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Black Hills Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Noble Fir Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Greenwich Estates Pine Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill California Baby Redwood Flip Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Balsam Fir Narrow Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Frosted Fraser Fir Most Realistic,Frosted White Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill Snowy Branch LED Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Noble Fir Flip Tree'
  - Name='Balsam Hill BH Nordmann Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='The Holiday Aisle Tall Douglas Fir Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Northlight Artificial Downswept Pine Christmas Tree'
  - Name='National Tree Company 7.5 ft. Feel Real Downswept Douglas Fir Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Puleo International Pre-Lit 6.5' White Pencil Northern Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 250 Lights'
  - Name='Nearly Natural 8ft. Belgium Fir Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Pier 1 Pre-Lit Montana Pine Artificial Christmas Tree'
  - Name='Glitzhome 9ft Pre-Lit Green Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 500 Strawberry Lights'
  - Name='Puleo 6.5ft Pre-Lit Flocked Portland Pine Pencil Artificial Christmas Tree'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International Pre-Lit 5' Alpine Artificial Christmas Tree with 150 Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pre-lit, smaller size, but different tree species (Alpine) and fewer lights, likely different branch technology and shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill 3.5' BH Balsam Fir Tabletop Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Much smaller tabletop size, different brand and species (Balsam Fir), likely different branch style and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Denali White Christmas Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High realism from Balsam Hill and similar full-size tree but possibly different color and species, some relevancy in high-quality construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Black Hills Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Full-size tree from different species (Spruce), different brand, likely similar purpose but varied branch style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Noble Fir Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar premium artificial tree with noble fir species, good realism but different type than downswept Douglas fir.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Greenwich Estates Pine Tree Most Realistic Green Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Realistic pine tree, similar quality and size but different tree species and shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Narrow Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Narrow Fraser Fir tree, similar quality but narrower shape and different species.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Vermont White Spruce Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species and possibly shape, similar full-size tree from premium brand.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Fraser Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Full Fraser Fir tree from Balsam Hill, similar premium artificial tree but different species and shape.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill California Baby Redwood Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different species (Redwood), flip branch style, likely less similar shape and branch tip technology.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Balsam Fir Narrow Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Narrow Balsam Fir from Balsam Hill, full size but different species and narrower silhouette.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Frosted Fraser Fir Most Realistic,Frosted White Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Similar Fraser Fir species but frosted white finish differentiates appearance and intended style.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill Snowy Branch LED Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Snowy branch style with LED lights likely changes appearance and branch construction significantly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Noble Fir Flip Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Noble Fir species with flip branches, different branch mechanism than hinged downswept branches.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Balsam Hill BH Nordmann Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Nordmann Fir is a popular realistic fir species, similar premium build but different fir type.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: The Holiday Aisle Tall Douglas Fir Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Also pre-lit Douglas Fir tree but different brand and unknown if downswept or branch tip technology is similar.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Northlight Artificial Downswept Pine Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Downswept branch style similar to reference but pine species, different brand and likely less natural branch tips.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: National Tree Company 7.5 ft. Feel Real Downswept Douglas Fir Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Same brand and same Feel Real downswept Douglas Fir tree, very close product with slight height difference; effectively identical.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo International Pre-Lit 6.5' White Pencil Northern Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 250 Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Pencil narrow shape with less lights and different species (Northern Fir) reduces similarity.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Nearly Natural 8ft. Belgium Fir Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different fir species and brand, taller tree but likely similar artificial Christmas tree purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pier 1 Pre-Lit Montana Pine Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Different pine species and brand, pre-lit but less likely to have downswept shape or Feel Real branches.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Glitzhome 9ft Pre-Lit Green Slim Fir Artificial Christmas Tree with 500 Strawberry Lights
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fir silhouette differs from full downswept shape, different brand and strawberry lights differ from clear.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Puleo 6.5ft Pre-Lit Flocked Portland Pine Pencil Artificial Christmas Tree
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Flocked pine pencil shape is dissimilar to full downswept fir tree, different species and branch construction.
